title: PDF Samvad
description: Pdf Samvad is a collaborative platform for PDFs built with Next.js and Firebase. It seamlessly integrates chat, powered by Gemini AI, allowing you to share, listen to responses, and download chat history. The robust Python FastAPI backend ensures smooth operation, while Render provides effortless deployment.

title: Front-End Developer at SALESKLIK (April 2023 - Present)
description:
• Designed and developed a seller dashboard (ReactJS, Redux Toolkit, Bootstrap) for product management, inventory control, and storefront customization.
  • Built pre-defined storefront themes within the seller dashboard for user flexibility.
  • Implemented Next.js with server-side rendering (SSR) to improve SEO and Google search ranking of storefronts.

title: Web Developer at COMVAL IT Solution Pvt Ltd (January 2023 - March 2023)
description:
• Modernized legacy HTML projects using ReactJS to enhance user experience and functionality.
  • Developed user and business dashboards with ReactJS and Redux Toolkit for improved data visualization.
  • Streamlined development workflow by deploying projects on a VPS machine for efficient delivery.
